body:
Hey guys! Am I the only one who has terrible internet connection?

I cannot even do anything when I join a server... 
Is this just me or everyone else too?
Please help me with this!! 

Im like a Monument on Nebula right now!! IM BEING BROKEN!! ;(

title: Terrible Internet!! HELP -.-

replies.body: What's you connection speed? check it on here: http://www.speedtest.net/
